channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pat Gelsinger wants to save Moore’s Law, with a little help from the Feds
item.description: The company is aiming to produce its first silicon wafers by 2028 and have its first commercial system online by 2029.

item.title: Is it time to ‘refound’ your startup?
item.description: Sometimes, founding a startup just once isn’t enough.

item.title: After you check out your Spotify Wrapped 2025, explore these copycats
item.description: Spotify’s annual Wrapped feature just dropped, giving listeners a fun, personalized summary of their listening habits. It has gained immense popularit...

item.title: How would the Netflix-Warner Bros. deal reshape Hollywood?
item.description: It’s only been a day since Netflix announced an $82.7 billion deal to acquire Warner Bros., and the acquisition has already been described as sending ...

item.title: Why Tehran Is Running Out of Water
item.description: Because of shifting storms and sweltering summers, Iran’s capital faces a future “Day Zero” when the taps run dry.

item.title: Meta reportedly delays mixed reality glasses until 2027
item.description: aMeta lready sells VR headsets and Ray-Ban smart glasses, but these new glasses sound a bit different. Their format factor would reportedly be similar...

item.title: The 46 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Frankenstein, Troll 2, and A House of Dynamite are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: Lenovo Legion Go Gen 2 Review: A High-End Gaming Handheld
item.description: This premium gaming handheld loads up with features, but Windows still holds it back from being the easy option.

item.title: Creator IShowSpeed sued for allegedly punching, choking viral humanoid Rizzbot
item.description: Creator IShowSpeed sued after punching, choking viral humanoid Rizzbot.

item.title: The 46 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Stranger Things, The Beast in Me, and Last Samurai Standing are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.
